questions.question: What makes the option buttons change appearance on hover?

CSS content property changes the text

questions.question: What CSS unit is primarily used for spacing (padding, margins)?

options: Global JavaScript variables like currentQuestion and userAnswers

questions.question: What creates the circular score display on the results screen?
